text: Alcohol gives you infinite patience for stupidity.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

text: And I love that even in the toughest moments, when we're all sweating it - when we're worried that the bill won't pass, and it seems like all is lost - Barack never lets himself get distracted by the chatter and the noise. Just like his grandmother, he just keeps getting up and moving forward... with patience and wisdom, and courage and grace.
author: Michelle Obama

text: Faith is not simply a patience that passively suffers until the storm is past. Rather, it is a spirit that bears things - with resignations, yes, but above all, with blazing, serene hope.
author: Corazon Aquino

text: Meekness: Uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while.
author: Ambrose Bierce

text: The days of our lives, for all of us, are numbered. We know that. And yes, there are certainly times when we aren't able to muster as much strength and patience as we would like. It's called being human.
author: Elizabeth Edwards
